participant_abstract.sent: During this meeting we a) looked at a prototype design for the remote control device b) perforned an evaluation exercise on whether this prototype met the criteria identified by the marketing dept and c) reviewed and finalised the initial costings for production of the remote control device.

participant_decisions.sent: Decisions made: a.. to reject double curved design in favour of single curved design [to reduce costs] b.. to reject voice recognition function [to reduce costs] c.. to recommend production of the prototype model to Head Office.

participant_problems.sent: A.. time delays re changing cables for PowerPoint presentations b.. some of our best ideas [re satisfying user requirements]had to be rejected simply to bring in the project within budget costs.
